SEARCH
Package Game.Entities.Commons

Interface IEntity

All Superinterfaces:
IBehaviour
All Known Implementing Classes:
Bomber, BomberGhost, BomberStriker, Enemy, Entity, Gunner, Player, Striker
public interface IEntity extends IBehaviour
Interface for all entity types that can have state, health, and weapons. Provides methods for managing state machines, health, weapons, animation, and collision resolution.
